alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 23 at 5:20PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Bands of snow showers will continue in part of northern and central Nevada... National Weather Service radar is showing several bands of moderate snow across portions of northern and central Nevada. One band has set up across the I-80 corridor from Ryndon west to Emigrant Pass with another band having formed across portions of US Highway 50 from Pinto Summit west to Hickison Summit, including a part of SR278 from Eureka to Garden Pass. These bands of snow are capable of reducing visibility to one-half mile or less in moderate snow with snowfall rates of one-half to one inch per hour. This could lead to rapidly deteriorating road conditions, causing slick driving conditions. If driving through one of these bands, please use low beams and reduce speed to arrive safely at your destination. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
